text:
@ochocinco $musbahdin1994

The hours I work has been reduced. Having to work during coronavirus(Covid-19) I am at risk of not being able to  make ends meet, rent and other expenses(carpool) every month. I work as much as they would let me although it’s not enough.I carpool to work weekly.
